titles.title: What a mighty God we serve,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a mighty God we serve,
What a mighty God we serve,
What a mighty God we serve,
What a mighty God we serve.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He has all the power to save...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let us praise the living God...

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: He is the King of all the earth...
